name: Fengyuan Xu
content: Fengyuan Xu @ NJU About Me I am a Professor with the School of Computer Science at Nanjing University. Prior to joining NJU, I worked at NEC Labs Princeton as a full-time Researcher. I was also a Visiting Researcher at Microsoft Research Asia. I earned my Ph.D. in Computer Science from the College of William and Mary, and received the Distinguished Dissertation Award in Natural and Computational Sciences. My research experitse lies at the intersection of Security, Autonomy and Mobility. I seek to explore computationally scientific discoveries with real-world impact and create disruptive innovations reshaping how people live. My long-term goal is to foster a symbiotic relationship between human and AI in a mutually beneficial way. I am currently working on Agentic AI for Security and Privacy, with a focus on AI-empowered security & privacy autonomy, collaborative agents for security professionals, and trustworthy AI computing with affordable cost. To prospective students 招收安全领域可持续AI智能体设计、带隐私保护的移动端AI用户助理、AI推理的可信执行环境、端到端自动驾驶模型可解释性、Web3.0及智能合约的安全自动化、去中心化AI的数据要素市场等研究方向的本硕博学生。欢迎志同道合的同学发信至我的邮箱 fengyuan DOT xu AT nju DOT edu DOT cn。除了基本信息和经验背景，请在邮件中表明你感兴趣的方向及原因，并从下列featured papers中挑选一篇总结其中内容和阐述你的见解(长短不限)。谢谢。 News One paper accepted to FSE 2025. Two papers accepted to S&P 2025 and TIFS. Served as PC for Usenix Security 2025. Four papers accepted to TDCS, TIFS, TMC and TKDD. Two papers accepted to ICRA'24, MM'24.
